index.description: Over 30 years as an entertainer and magician in the Preston area, performing magic shows for children of all ages; I always guarantee a memorable performance.
index.title: Hi, I'm Al Jolly the Magician!
bodyText: I have over 30 years experience as an entertainer and magician throughout the Preston, Fylde and Lancashire areas, performing fun and colourful puppet and magic shows (complete the party with games, prizes and music!) for children of all ages.
My shows are guaranteed to provide a laughter filled, memorable occasion for the whole family, club or school, whatever the occasion.

Of course, you can rest assured I hold a DBS Enhanced Certificate along with being a member of The Lancashire Partnership Against Crime (run in association with Lancashire Constabulary) and all my electrical equipment is P.A.T. tested each year giving you peace of mind that it will be a safe event. Being a member of EQUITY means I hold a Public Liability Insurance of £10m.
Please do contact me to discuss your ideas and requirements using our contact form, Facebook or Twitter.

safeguarding-children.description: My safeguarding magic shows for children are designed to teach them about safety in the community. They are delivered in schools with the local police.
safeguarding-children.title: Safeguarding Magic Shows For Schools
bodyText: My 'Safeguarding Children Show' is designed to communicate the importance of personal safety measures to Primary School children (Key Stage 2).

I deliver this 50 minute show on your school premises and with the help of 'Buddy the Puppet' and appropriate magical effects, children are guaranteed to stay engaged and absorb this essential message.

Since designing this show in collaboration with Lancashire Constabulary and The Lancashire Partnership Against Crime in 2009, I have performed in over 100 schools in Lancashire and surrounding areas - with great feedback.
Also, being a member of EQUITY means I hold a Public Liability Insurance of £10m.
If you are interested in this show for your school, or children's group or club, I would love to hear from you!

close-up-magic.description: My fun magic shows are suitable for parties, weddings, christenings, birthdays, trade shows or graduations. Suitable for adults and children alike.
close-up-magic.title: Close up Magic Shows
bodyText: Whether it's a private party, wedding, Christening, birthday, corporate event, trade show or graduation - if you want to put the 'fun' into your 'function' I'm your man!

I perform table top entertainment or simply 'mingle' with your guests with my Modern Magic or my unique Victorian Street Magic. Whatever your requirements, you'll be amazed by top quality magic using everyday objects, performed in a fun and friendly way right before your eyes!

Of course, you can rest assured I hold a DBS Enhanced Certificate along with being a member of The Lancashire Partnership Against Crime (run in association with Lancashire Constabulary) and all my electrical equipment is P.A.T. tested each year giving you peace of mind that it will be a safe event. Being a member of EQUITY means I hold a Public Liability Insurance of £10m.
Please do get in touch and together we can make your function magical.

balloon-modelling.description: If your party needs to pop, I am an experienced balloon modeller. Hire me for your child's party, summer fete or event to make swords, hats flowers and more!
balloon-modelling.title: Balloon Modelling
bodyText: My balloon modelling brings fun & colour to any event and enhances the party atmosphere.
I offer a vast range of sculptures from different animals, swords, hats, flowers and much more, which become a personalised gift for each guest!

Children's parties, school shows and summer fetes are made memorable with these special balloons and adults love them too, whether the occasion is in a restaurant, function suite or at a university ball! This service can also be tailored to suit any corporate or PR event.  So please do get in touch to discuss your requirements.

contact.description: Please contact me to hire a professional, experienced entertainer and magician for your party or event in the Preston and Fylde area.
contact.title: Contact Form

404.title: 404 - Page not found
bodyText: We're very sorry about this, but the page you requested could not be found.
Please try pressing back in your browser or trying a different page from our navigation.
